channel.title: Samples :: WebLogic Kubernetes Operator
channel.description: The samples provide demonstrations of how to accomplish common tasks. These samples are provided for educational and demonstration purposes only; they are not intended to be used in production deployments or to be depended upon to create production environments. CredentialsSample for creating a Kubernetes Secret that contains the Administration Server credentials. This Secret can be used in creating a WebLogic Domain YAML file. StorageSample for creating a PV or PVC that can be used by a Domain YAML file as the persistent storage for the WebLogic domain home or log files.

item.title: Credentials
item.description: Sample for creating a Kubernetes Secret that contains the Administration Server credentials. This Secret can be used in creating a WebLogic Domain YAML file.

item.title: Storage
item.description: Sample for creating a PV or PVC that can be used by a Domain YAML file as the persistent storage for the WebLogic domain home or log files.

item.title: Run a database
item.description: Run an ephemeral database in Kubernetes that is suitable for sample or basic testing purposes.

item.title: Domains
item.description: These samples show various choices for working with domains.

item.title: REST APIs
item.description: Sample for generating a self-signed certificate and private key that can be used for the operator's external REST API.

item.title: Ingress
item.description: Ingress controllers and load balancer sample scripts.

item.title: Elastic Stack
item.description: OperatorSample for configuring the Elasticsearch and Kibana deployments and services for the operator's logs. WebLogic domainSample for using Fluentd for WebLogic domain and operator's logs.

item.title: Azure Kubernetes Service
item.description: Sample for using the operator to set up a WLS cluster on the Azure Kubernetes Service.

item.title: Tanzu Kubernetes Service
item.description: Sample for using the operator to set up a WLS cluster on the Tanzu Kubernetes Service.
